title: Ornn's Upgrades and their names.
body:
I started reading up on the pbe patch notes on surrender at 20 and I saw a list of the upgrades Ornn gives. I'm not here to talk about the items in terms of their stats and whatnot but what i did want to give my two cents on was the name changes.

Most of the name changes are fine. It's cool to see them given a name that makes them sound like bigger stronger items. I would encourage a little bit more thought/time be put into some of them. Molten edge sounds kinda dumb compared to infinity edge not gonna lie. Circlet of the iron solari almost felt lame compared to locket. I don't have any suggestions unfortunately, I'm thinking about infinity but nothing yet. I do quite like infernal mask though, it really feels like an upgrade.

The name that blew me away though was salvation. Redemption is a nice impactful item and, while i understand these upgrades are strictly stat upgrades from what i've seen so far, seeing the name go from what it is now to what i view as a more powerful word, a more powerful version of the item, makes it feel like an amazing upgrade.

replies.body: You sir, just made Squad5's day. He named it, defended it, and won us all hands down.

I like them, I just wish Ornn had specific quotes for his allies when they upgraded specific items.

{{item:3071}} - "Noxian axes are good. Obsidian makes it better."

{{item:3068}} - "Hand it over. Just needs a bit more time in the forge."

{{item:3001}} - "I don't like magic. But I'll make it tougher for you, I suppose."

{{item:3190}} - "That looks dumb around your neck. Let's put it on your head."
If you do ever managed to get the voice actor in on some skin or some other champion or something that would be cool.
